paragraph__1.content: .breadcrumbs

product_data__preorder_cta.label: Preorder Call to Action
product_data__preorder_cta.info: Change the default 'Add to Cart' buttons to 'Pre-Order'

paragraph__1.content: Please follow the instructions [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/inventory/getting-started-with-inventory/hide-out-of-stock#hide-out-of-stock-products-using-shopify-flow) to create a Shopify Flow to hide Products from Collections when all Variants are Out Of Stock

product_data__variants_color_swatches.label: Variant Metafield based Colors Swatches
product_data__variants_color_swatches.info: Format: 'namespace.key'. Metafield Namespaces need to be setup below to match the required metafield. DANGER: This can increase the load time of the entire site.

paragraph__2.content: DANGER: Hiding products with an override can lead to inconsistent results on collections and in search results, as Pagination is calculated before filtering the products.

product_data__metafields_namespaces.label: Metafield Namespaces
product_data__metafields_namespaces.info: Load additional metafield namespaces to allow for dynamic data to populate. DANGER: This can increase the load time of the entire site. Format: 'metafields.custom' or 'variants.metafields.custom'

paragraph__3.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

paragraph__4.content: Important: Using custom metafields requires to load the Metafield data into the Product Data Modal via the `Product Data` Section.

header__7.content: Used for Individual Rating / Reviews Metafield

product_card__image__default_source.label: Primary Image Source
product_card__image__default_source.info: Choosing the Variant option will automatically show the Searched Variant on the Search Page or via Collection Filters.

options__2.label: Next Available Image after Variant (Color only)

product_card__image__drop_shadow.label: Add a drop shadow to the image

paragraph__2.content: You can setup custom labels via product metafields using `metafields.smart.product_labels` as a list of single line text.

product_card__labels__discount.label: Discount Label type
product_card__labels__discount.info: Shows when a product has a higher compare at price than the price field.

product_card__variant_count__show_hover.label: Show Variant Count only on Hover

product_card__description__show.label: Show Description
product_card__description__show.info: The Short Description is set via the Product metafield: smart.short_description

product_card__color_selector.label: Swatches Color/Image Selection
product_card__color_selector.info: The default fallback option for all choices is via the Product Option title and `swatches.json` setup.

product_card__button_color_variant_add_t.label: Show Add to Cart for color variants

product_card__button_single_variant_add_.label: Show Add to Cart if no variants

paragraph__1.content: Matches Product Options containing "color" Values as highest priority

collection__filter_variant_color_metafie.label: Variant Metafield based Colors Swatches
collection__filter_variant_color_metafie.info: Format: 'namespace.key'. Metafield Namespaces need to be setup in the Product Data to match the required metafield. DANGER: This can increase the load time of the entire site.

small_product_card__variant_selector__sh.label: Show Variant Selector & Skip Product Drawer

.article-card-title
.cart-title
These features are still in development and may not work as expected. Use at your own risk.

all.center_products_if_less_than_width: Center Products if less than width
all.number_of_columns_on_desktop_filter_visi: Number of columns on Desktop / Filter Visible
all.secondary_logo_dark_on_light_background: Secondary Logo Dark on light background
all.secondary_logo_light_on_dark_background: Secondary Logo Light on dark background

all.mobile_add_show_more_button_after_x_item: Mobile: Add Show more button after X items
all.add_a_drop_shadow_to_the_image: Add a drop shadow to the image
all.label: Label
all.author: Author
all.name: name

discount_type.info: Due to the way Shopify handles Discounts, its not possible to combine 'Buy X for Y' with `Amount/Percentage Off` discounts. Please ensure that no overlapping discounts are setup on your Admin dashboard to avoid problems. Read more here TODO: Add Link to Documentation

target_limit.info: Displaying a large number of products can affect the sites performance as more data is loaded

paragraph__1.content: Free Shipping Discounts are based on All Products in an Order. You can however choose to display a range of products as an Upsell option.

fs_target.info: Quantity as number - In Cents for `Purchase amount` calculation (i.e. $39,40 -> 3940)

target.info: Quantity as number - In Cents for `Purchase amount` calculation (i.e. $39,40 -> 3940)

receives_discount.info: 0 - 100 for Percentage Discounts / 100 = Free Product - In Cents for `Purchase amount` calculation (i.e. $39,40 -> 3940)

message.label: Message

cart__recommended_products_source.info: Auto-generated related products are not selectable and need to be added manually to each Product.

cart__recommended_products.label: Recommended Products
cart__recommended_products.info: Fallback in case complementary products are not set up.

paragraph__1.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

short_text.label: Shorter Text
short_text.info: Change this if you need a shorter text on smaller devices.

display_duration.label: Display duration
display_duration.info: Only applicable if multiple announcements are active.

scheduled.label: Activate Scheduling
scheduled.info: Requires at least a Start or End Date

checkout_disabled.label: Disable Checkout if only cart item

variant_id.label: Variant id
variant_id.info: Defaults to the first available variant if empty

paragraph__1.content: The following settings are only required if you want to use a custom price. You will need Shopify Plus with a Cart API Function in place to use the below settings.

paragraph__2.content: The price will be the fixed price if set, otherwise the percentage of the cart value will be used. The percentage will only be used if the cart value is above the threshold.

title.info: Supports type text metafield access on Global Objects (Product, Article, Collection, Page, Shop, Blog) via [object.namespace.field] placeholder
Supports type text metafield access on Global Objects (Product, Article, Collection, Page, Shop, Blog) via [object.namespace.field] placeholder
Needs to match the label in the Search & Discovery App.

paragraph__1.content: The section uses the collection image as a default. Alternatively, you can setup the image via metafields. Metafield images take priority over collection images.

collection_image_metafield.info: You can setup metafields in your theme settings. Use the 'smart' namespace when setting up the Metafield. (I.e. 'smart.key')

title.info: Supports type text metafield access on Global Objects (Product, Article, Collection, Page, Shop, Blog) via [object.namespace.field] placeholder

collection_metafield.info: You can setup metafields in your theme settings. Use the 'smart' namespace when setting up the Metafield. (I.e. 'smart.key')

custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

paragraph__1.content: Featured Image for Products, Collections and Blog Articles will be used by default. You can specify a different image by adding a metafield to the relevant resource.

metafield.label: Metafield Image Override
metafield.info: If you want to use a metafield to override the image, enter the metafield key here with the format: `namespace.key`. Needs to be applied to the relevant linked resource (Product/Collection/Blog/Article/Page).

paragraph__2.content: You can override up to 5 images by specifying the dropdown menu handle and adding an image

title.info: Supports type text metafield access on Global Objects (Product, Article, Collection, Page, Shop, Blog) via [object.namespace.field] placeholder

page.info: Uses the page Title as the question and the content as the answer

source.info: Supports metafield access on Global Objects (Product, Article, Collection, Page, Shop, Blog) via [object.namespace.field] placeholder

paragraph__1.content: Supports `list.collection_reference` for Collections, `list.product_reference` for Products, and `collection_reference` for Products.

title.info: Supports type text metafield access on Global Objects (Product, Article, Collection, Page, Shop, Blog) via [object.namespace.field] placeholder

gallery__size.info: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

variants_image_metafield.info: Enter the metafield key here with the format: `namespace.key`. Needs to be configured with the relevant resource: (Variant). DANGER: The Gallery section is dynamically rendered via JS and the metafield data needs to be loaded in Theme Settings -> Product Data -> Metafields via `variants.metafields.namespace` where the namespace matches the designated namespace. This will load all metafields under the namespace and can cause potential performance issues. If you are using this feature, please don't hesitate to contact us to discuss the best way to implement this.

image_selector.info: Applies to products with up to 18 Variants and needs an image attached to each variant.

paragraph__1.content: The options apply if the `Variant by Image` selector is disabled or products do not meet the requirements.

color_selector__source.info: The default fallback option for all choices is via the Product Option title and `swatches.json` setup.

color_list.info: Comma seperated list of colors to match by Product Option

custom_tag_overrides.info: Comma separated list to override Each Dropdown block Title. Must be in the same order as the Dropdowns

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom_tag_overrides.info: Comma separated list to override Each Dropdown block Title. Must be in the same order as the Dropdowns

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

source.info: Auto-generated related products are not selectable and need to be added manually to each Product.

products.info: Fallback in case complementary products are not set up.

paragraph__1.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

heading_1.info: Leave the heading label blank to hide the icon column.

heading_2.info: Leave the heading label blank to hide the icon column.

heading_3.info: Leave the heading label blank to hide the icon column.

heading_4.info: Leave the heading label blank to hide the icon column.

paragraph__1.content: You can setup up to 10 Product Sibling groups here. Make sure that you include the siblings block within the product information section.

options.label: Options
options.info: Comma seperated list of the options title in the same order as the selected products. Fallback is the product title

hide_if_empty.info: The section will always show in the Theme Editor to enable easy customization.

metafield.info: Only works if you are on a Product Page or the metafield is setup on the collect/article/product that you are on.

hide_if_empty.info: The section will always show in the Theme Editor to enable easy customization.

metafield.info: Only works if you are on a Product Page or the metafield is setup on the collect/article/product that you are on.

title.info: Supports type text metafield access on Global Objects (Product, Article, Collection, Page, Shop, Blog) via [object.namespace.field] placeholder

products.info: Select the products to display - the first image will be used

collections.info: Select the collections to display - the first image will be used

title.info: Supports type text metafield access on Global Objects (Product, Article, Collection, Page, Shop, Blog) via [object.namespace.field] placeholder
Needs to match the label in the Search & Discovery App.

autoplay.info: You can use a different preview Video by using the 'Preview Video Block'

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google maps will find the exact location

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: You'll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map

background_image.info: Use instead of an API key

background_image_position.label: Image focal point
background_image_position.info: Used to keep the subject of your photo in view.

min_height.info: Set ot 0 to adjust to the content height.
